data.actual_result: You're in a random channel which isn't even the last channel you've visited before logging in.
data.expected_result: You're taken to the friends tab.
data.short_description: When you log out and login with another account then log in again, you aren't in the friends tab. You're in a random channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Logout. - Login with a different account. - Logout again. - Login with the account you initially were on.
